Detailed Description

Device profile peristor that allows for .NET implementations to be used from C++.

This class is used internally by .NET device profile persistors in order to create a bridge between C++ and .NET. A .NET implementation class should not use this class directly. Instead, it should implement the DeviceProfilePersistor abstract class.
